T11bsa071_u:2: (1.1) parokṣārthapratipatteranumānāśrayatvādeva tad vyutpādanārtha saṃkṣepata idamārabhyate- pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustridhaiva saḥ
T11bsa071_u:9: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet / na /
T11bsa071_u:11: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta /
T11bsa071_u:12: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe 'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam,
T11bsa071_u:13: tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva bhāvaniyamārtha dharmivacanamāśaṃkyeta /
T11bsa071_u:14: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:21: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva /
T11bsa071_u:23: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:26: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato 'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:29: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate /
T11bsa071_u:31: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam /
T11bsa071_u:36: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vānveṣate /
T11bsa071_u:37: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati /
T11bsa071_u:41: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate /
T11bsa071_u:42: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe iti viśeṣaṇīyam /
T11bsa071_u:43: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva,
T11bsa071_u:49: tato 'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ /
T11bsa071_u:51: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇena abhinnayogakṣematvāduttareṣāṃ kvacidaprāmāṇyaprasaṅga iti cet / na /
T11bsa071_u:53: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:62: satsu apyanyeṣu hetuṣu asyābhāve na bhavatīti yastadbhāve bhāvastadabhāve 'bhāvaśca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tasya siddhiḥ
T11bsa071_u:63: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti,
T11bsa071_u:64: agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti /
T11bsa071_u:70: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatirekasādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate
T11bsa071_u:81: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva /
T11bsa071_u:82: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme 'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam /
T11bsa071_u:84: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha /
T11bsa071_u:88: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam /
T11bsa071_u:91: tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti /
T11bsa071_u:93: (2.3) atra pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva pratijñārthasya pratīteḥ na pratijñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:96: pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati /
T11bsa071_u:97: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati /
T11bsa071_u:99: pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam /
T11bsa071_u:100: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko 'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:104: yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta /
T11bsa071_u:105: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate /
T11bsa071_u:106: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko 'nayoravasthayorviśeṣaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:107: dṛṣṭā ca pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrāt sādharmyavatprayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pratītiriti kastasyopayogaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:109: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate iti kimatra kāraṇam?
T11bsa071_u:113: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti /
T11bsa071_u:116: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo 'pi na kaścit /
T11bsa071_u:120: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat /
T11bsa071_u:123: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko 'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt /
T11bsa071_u:126: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho 'pi vyatirekaprayogo na yuktaḥ,
T11bsa071_u:128: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:130: svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:132: na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ /
T11bsa071_u:138: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti /
T11bsa071_u:139: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit /
T11bsa071_u:141: yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:143: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,
T11bsa071_u:146: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante /
T11bsa071_u:148: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate /
T11bsa071_u:155: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa071_u:157: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:159: (2.10) yadi te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti /
T11bsa071_u:162: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo 'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran /
T11bsa071_u:165: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet /
T11bsa071_u:166: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam /
T11bsa071_u:167: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet / na /
T11bsa071_u:169: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo
T11bsa071_u:170: bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo
T11bsa071_u:171: bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:174: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede 'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena bhedaḥ mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛdrūpābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa071_u:175: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:177: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti?
T11bsa071_u:178: guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta?
T11bsa071_u:181: tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate iti cet / na /
T11bsa071_u:183: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi /
T11bsa071_u:184: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:186: asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve 'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena /
T11bsa071_u:187: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve 'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,
T11bsa071_u:191: 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti
T11bsa071_u:193: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane 'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante
T11bsa071_u:194: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam /
T11bsa071_u:195: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:196: na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā kā tarhi?
T11bsa071_u:201: tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt,
T11bsa071_u:206: te samarthā eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,
T11bsa071_u:212: kadācidanyathāpi syuḥ tataścaiko 'pi kvacit janayed iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:213: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ
T11bsa071_u:215: tatra yo 'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ /
T11bsa071_u:216: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ
T11bsa071_u:217: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino doṣā nopalīyante /
T11bsa071_u:218: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:219: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,
T11bsa071_u:222: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:227: kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet /
T11bsa071_u:228: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati,
T11bsa071_u:231: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattirevasā /
T11bsa071_u:232: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt /
T11bsa071_u:233: (2.17) api ca yo 'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti /
T11bsa071_u:235: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte /
T11bsa071_u:236: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,
T11bsa071_u:237: hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
T11bsa071_u:238: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ,
T11bsa071_u:239: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
T11bsa071_u:241: svabhāvasteṣāṃ kāryakriyādharmā tena samastapratyayānāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiriti /
T11bsa071_u:242: so 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt?
T11bsa071_u:244: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti?
T11bsa071_u:245: ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti /
T11bsa071_u:246: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:249: na hi sa sāhitye 'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt /
T11bsa071_u:250: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:251: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti?
T11bsa071_u:257: yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kārakākārakayoḥ svabhāvataddhetvorvirodhāt /
T11bsa071_u:258: (2.20) yo 'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11bsa071_u:260: kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,
T11bsa071_u:261: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi karotyeva?
T11bsa071_u:262: kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:267: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?
T11bsa071_u:269: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:270: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo 'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
T11bsa071_u:274: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt /
T11bsa071_u:275: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
T11bsa071_u:277: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
T11bsa071_u:279: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve 'pi odanajanma syāt /
T11bsa071_u:280: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet
T11bsa071_u:281: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati /
T11bsa071_u:282: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam /
T11bsa071_u:283: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ
T11bsa071_u:284: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato 'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:287: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
T11bsa071_u:292: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
T11bsa071_u:295: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:296: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne 'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati /
T11bsa071_u:298: na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati /
T11bsa071_u:300: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyāpi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
T11bsa071_u:303: tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet /
T11bsa071_u:304: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
T11bsa071_u:309: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam /
T11bsa071_u:310: (2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,
T11bsa071_u:312: tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā /
T11bsa071_u:316: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo 'pi tathā syād ityuktam /
T11bsa071_u:318: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:319: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo 'pi kuryāt /
T11bsa071_u:320: prāyastu saṃghātasthāyī bhāvasantānaḥ sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat /
T11bsa071_u:323: (2.26) tasmādyo yadātmā sa svasattāmātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati na bhūtvā tadbhāve parābhisaṃskāramapekṣata iti svabhāvato 'sthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiñcitrāśakāraṇaiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:324: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit svabhāvānyathātvasya kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt /
T11bsa071_u:325: tadanyathātvapratipattau sa tatsvabhāva eva na syāditi pūrva eva vikalpaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:327: yaśca parasmādanyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ yaścāparaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya syāt?
T11bsa071_u:329: tathā ca yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ na tasyānyathābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:330: etena kaṭhinādīnāṃ tāmrādīnām agnyādeḥ dravatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pratyuktā /
T11bsa071_u:331: tatrāpi pūrvakasya svarasanirodhitvādvināśe 'gnyāderupādānāccāpara eva dravādisvabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:337: nedaṃ vikalpadvayamatikrāmati - kiṃ nityo bhāva utānityaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:338: prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo bhavatīti ca bruvāṇo bhāvadvayaṃ cāha nityānityasvabhāvabhedam /
T11bsa071_u:339: prāktanasya nityābhimatasya svabhāvasya svayaṃ nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadaiva nāśamanāśaṃ ca prāheti pūrvasmin vināśaheturasamartha eva /
T11bsa071_u:344: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma?
T11bsa071_u:346: tasmāt satyasya vināśe vināśasvabhāvena tena bhavitavyaṃ,
T11bsa071_u:348: tena svabhāvato naścare 'naśvare vā bhāve na vināśahetorupayogaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:349: (2.28) tasmādvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣo bhāvastadbhāvaniyataḥ iti yaḥ san sa vināśī naśvaratāyā nivṛttau sattvanivṛtirityanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:351: na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na tatribandhanānvayavyatirekāsiddhiriti cet /
T11bsa071_u:357: itthaṃ ca yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:362: tasmāt kāryaṃ svabhāvairyāvadbhiravinābhāvi kāraṇe teṣāṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa071_u:364: taireva ca dharmairye tairvinā na bhavanti /
T11bsa071_u:366: na, tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇe 'bhimatatvāt liṅga viśeṣopādhīnāṃ ca sāmānyānām /
T11bsa071_u:372: tatra yadi dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagjyā anyato 'pi bhavettadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
T11bsa071_u:376: na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyaḥ svabhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:381: tasmādyo dhūmajananaḥ so 'gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janitaḥ sa eva dhūmo bhavatīti kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ svabhāvasya niyamāt tadvijātīyādutpattirna bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:382: tadyādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇād dṛṣṭamekadā tattanna vyabhicarati /
T11bsa071_u:383: tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:384: (3.3) nanu vijātīyādapi kiñcid bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tadyathā go mayādeḥ śālūkādiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:389: na hi ākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve nimittam,
T11bsa071_u:391: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagrayā avilakṣaṇakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryabhedābhedāvityahetukau viśvasya bhedābhedau syātām
T11bsa071_u:392: tathā hi na bhedādbheda iti abhedādapi nābhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:393: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
T11bsa071_u:400: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt /
T11bsa071_u:401: tajjananaśaktisāmye tu tadeveti na kāryaṃ duṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati /
T11bsa071_u:409: yatra yasmitrupalabhyamāne niyamena yasyopalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt satatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ ekajñānasaṃsargāt /
T11bsa071_u:413: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:416: uktamatra yathā paryudāsavṛttyāpekṣātaḥ tadvivikto 'rthastajjñānaṃ vābhāvo 'nupalabdhiścocyata iti /
T11bsa071_u:422: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam?
T11bsa071_u:423: kiṃ punarabhāvasya siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ? iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:426: yatsiddhau yasya na siddhistattasya liṅgaṃ bhavati dhūmāgnivat /
T11bsa071_u:429: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt,
T11bsa071_u:431: yathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvena ekārthasamavāyo dhūmasya vā liṅginaikārthasamavāyaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:433: naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yenāsyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:435: śabdārthayoḥ tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati tatprayogāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvalakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:436: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:437: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tanmukhena viṣayaviṣabhibhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:438: sa eva cāsati sambandhe na sidhyati /
T11bsa071_u:441: tathā ca ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt iti ghaṭasya sarvatra sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
T11bsa071_u:442: na, pradeśādirdharmī ghaṭābhāvena viśeṣyata iti tadviśeṣaṇabhūto 'bhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu kevalaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:447: yatraiva hi pradeśādau yatrāstīti ucyate sa eva tenāsaṃsṛṣṭo 'nyabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:448: taddarśanādevāsya ghaṭo nāsti iti vikalpo bhavati iti kathaṃ tasyaiva liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:449: (4.6) na cātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati yena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmāti,
T11bsa071_u:452: na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:453: tādṛśe kevale pradeśe sarvatrābhāva iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:455: sa ca tatpratipattāveva siddha iti kasya idānīṃ talliṅgam?
T11bsa071_u:458: (4.7) asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ tato 'nyabhāvādabhāvasya siddhiḥ iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:459: kena kasya virodho 'nyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭo yena liṅgaliṅganorvirodhaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt?
T11bsa071_u:464: (4.8) nanu anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyāpi tadabhāvagatirna syāditi cet /
T11bsa071_u:465: na vai kutaścit sambandhādanyabhāvastadabhāvagamaka iṣṭaḥ kintu anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo yathoktaṃ prāk /
T11bsa071_u:466: tasyānyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya kevalasyaikātmavyasthitasya tadātmanā pariccedasyaivānyavyavaccedatvāt tasya kaivalyamevāparasya vaikalyamiti tadanyabhāva eva tadabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:468: anyathā tasya pariccedena tato 'nyasya avyavaccede tatparicceda eva na syāt /
T11bsa071_u:470: ya eva vyavahāraḥ kasyacitkvaceddeśe darśanāt prāptiparihārārthaḥ sa na syāt /
T11bsa071_u:471: na hyayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi kevalam analameva paśyatīti kathaṃ salilārthī tatra na praverteta?
T11bsa071_u:474: yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā?
T11bsa071_u:476: tasya tato vānyasya kasyacidapyapratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ pratīyate tadā svāpamadamūrccāvyavadhānapṛṣṭhībhāvādyavasthāsvapi kiṃ na pratīyate?
T11bsa071_u:478: tasmādayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi analo 'yaṃ salilam iti nādhyavasyatīti na tiṣṭhetrāpi pratiṣṭheta /
T11bsa071_u:480: (4.9) tata evaikasya darśanād anyābhāvagatiścet kathamekaṃ dṛṣṭamanyatrāstīti pratyāyayati?
T11bsa071_u:483: tasmāttīrādarśineva śakuninā dūraparyaṭayāpi pratyāgantavyamityalam avidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā /
T11bsa071_u:484: (4.10) yadyekapariccedādevānyavyavaccedaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyānyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet /
T11bsa071_u:488: (4.11) ekātmapariccedāt tasya tadanyātmavyavaccedo bhavati tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānāt na hi tadātmā tadanyasyātmā bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:489: anyātmāvyavaccede pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:490: taṃ ca deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadātmanopalabhamānā buddhiḥ tathātvapracyutimasya vyavaccinati /
T11bsa071_u:492: yadi anyathābhāvo vyavaccinno bhavatiḥ tathātvaṃ ca tasyaiva bhavati nānyasyeti anyathābhūtāttathābhūtaṃ vyavaccindatyeva tat pariccinati /
T11bsa071_u:496: tasya tadanyatayā vyāptyabhāve tena tadarthāvyavaccedātpunarapi bhāvasyāpariccedaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa071_u:499: tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayati iti ekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:500: tathāhi kvacitpramāṇaṃ pravṛtaṃ tadeva tadanyasmād vyavaccinattī,
T11bsa071_u:502: tadanyadeva ca tasmād vyavaccinatti anyasya tatra apariccedāt /
T11bsa071_u:512: (4.13) anyabhāvaviṣayasyopalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaiva na tu liṅgatvena /
T11bsa071_u:515: na hi anyasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya tatpratipatteḥ anvayavyatirekau prasādhya tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
T11bsa071_u:516: kiṃ tarhi? tadanyaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
T11bsa071_u:517: darśanānantaram idamasti idaṃ tu nāsti iti vyavasthāpanāt /
T11bsa071_u:518: tacca tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati yasyānvayi vyatireko ca /
T11bsa071_u:520: na hi evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anyabhāvopalabdhistatra tadabhāvaḥ iti /
T11bsa071_u:523: kiṃtu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya sādhiketi anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānāmityapratipattiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:525: so 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇenānupalambhena siddhaḥ san mūḍhapratipattāvabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti alaṃ prasaṅgena /
T11bsa071_u:530: sa tathā siddhaḥ san kāryavyāpyayorabhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati /
T11bsa071_u:531: svabhāvānupalabdhau tu anupalabdhyā liṅgabhūtayā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate /
T11bsa071_u:532: (4.15) yadi kāraṇavyāpakau tadanyabhāvasiddhayānupalabdhyā siddhāsad vyavahārāvanyasyābhāvamabhāvavyavahāṃra ca sādhayataḥ /
T11bsa071_u:533: sā ca tayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāvevāsadvyavahārasya sādhiketi kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe 'rtheprayogaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:536: kevalaṃ kāraṇavyāpakayorhi siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvaḥ parasyāpi avaśyamabhāvaḥ iti etasya darśanārthamete prayujyete iti /
T11bsa071_u:537: eṣa eva pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān iti tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamakaḥ svaśādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt /
T11bsa071_u:539: trīṇi caitāni abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ ceti /
T11bsa071_u:540: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
T11bsa071_u:542: avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoḥ /
T11bsa071_u:543: sa hetustallakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi syād atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet?
T11bsa071_u:544: pratyakṣānumāne hi sādhyadharmaṃ bādhamāne taṃ dharmiṇo niṣkāsayataḥ tasmiṃśca satyeva heturbhavan taṃ tatraivāvasthāpayatīti paraṃ bata bhāvānāmasvāsthyam
T11bsa071_u:545: anyatra sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇeveti cet /
T11bsa071_u:546: tat kimayaṃ tapasvī śaṇḍhamudvāhya putraṃ mṛgayate?
T11bsa071_u:550: syādetad, yata eva heturanyathāpi bhavedata eva pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyata iti /
T11bsa071_u:553: bādhāyāmapi sādhyābhāvasya tena sādhanāt kutaḥ sādhanasya sāmarthyam /
T11bsa071_u:555: bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ syāditi na sāmarthyamabādhāyāḥ /
T11bsa071_u:557: kiṃ tarhi? bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādhāyāḥ saṃbhave 'pi syāditi sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:558: kiṃ nu vai heturbādhopalabdherbibheti na punarbādhāyā yena bādhāmanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:559: sa tarhi paramārthena- 'bādhā kimasti nāsti' ityanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:562: sa kiṃ kvacit satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed yenāsyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca pratyujyate /
T11bsa071_u:563: evaṃ ca sati abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:566: yathā ca bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
T11bsa071_u:568: (5.4) na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiti cet /
T11bsa071_u:577: upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi bādhāyā anivṛttau tadavasthaṃ hetorasāmarthyamityaprayogaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:578: tasmāt svasādhyabhāvābhāvādhyāmanyathāpi bhavanhetuḥ dharmiṇi na kiñcidbhāvayati na vibhāvayati iti tadupakṣepo na samarthaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:581: (5.5) tatrāma tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhavet lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati yasya bhāve 'pi yasya aparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:582: tadyathā pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti /
T11bsa071_u:583: n acaitad abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati iti na sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvinorhetuviruddhayorviṣaye bādhā saṃbhavati iti na tadabhāvaḥ pṛthaganayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:584: tasmād hetoḥ prayoge pratijñādoṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavo nāsti /
T11bsa071_u:588: katham? eko hi hetuḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhavediti tatrāvyabhicārī tatraiva tasmādanyo 'pi kathaṃ heturbhavati?
T11bsa071_u:589: ekasya yat sādhyaṃ tadabādhakasya dharmasya bhāva eva bhāvāditi bādhayā samānam /
T11bsa071_u:590: (5.7) api ca / kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānasya viparyayasya vā heturiṣṭa āhosvidapradarśitapratihetuḥ? kiṃ cātaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:592: na hi aniścitātmanaḥ pratipādakadharmasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ yathā sandigdhasya pakṣadharmatvasya /
T11bsa071_u:593: nāpi sandigdhalakṣaṇo heturbhavediti na kaścid heturbhavet /
T11bsa071_u:594: tulye lakṣaṇe di dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ saṃbhavo 'dṛṣṭapratiyogiṣu api śaṃkāmutpādayati viśeṣābhāvāt /
T11bsa071_u:595: sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
T11bsa071_u:596: yatastadviśeṣād heturekāntena nirastapratipakṣaḥ svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti atallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt tathā ca vyarthā ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā /
T11bsa071_u:597: ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ hīyeta svalakṣaṇayuktayorhetvorekatra dharmiṇi virodhenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārī iti /
T11bsa071_u:598: (5.8) na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ,
T11bsa071_u:600: tasmātrāstyevaṃ viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā bhavitavyam /
T11bsa071_u:601: dṛṣṭapratihetorapi hetoḥ prāgitareṇa na kaścidviśeṣo lakṣyate /
T11bsa071_u:607: “yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ nityamabhyupagaccati tadāyaṃ hetureva syād yadyatra anityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvādi kaścitra darśayed ” iti /
T11bsa071_u:609: nyāyamanupālayadbhirasaṃvaraṇīyamiti kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?
T11bsa071_u:610: sa tāvadayaṃ hetuḥ vastūni svasādhyaprakṛtīni kṛtvā tatpramāṇakān puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ
T11bsa071_u:611: śreyasābhyāṃ yojayitvā punaśca pratibhāvatā puruṣeṇa hetvantaranidarśanena utkīlitasādhanasāmarthyaḥ
T11bsa071_u:612: tāni vastūni tadbhāvasampadastāṃśca puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasasampadaḥ pracyāvya
T11bsa071_u:613: bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gaccatīti kimatra brūmaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:614: (5.10) puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ hi yadi sādhanatvaṃ syāt tadā na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā /
T11bsa071_u:615: sa ca heturyadi svabhāvatastaddharmabhāvī tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta?
T11bsa071_u:621: (5.11) jñānaṃ punarna liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T11bsa071_u:623: yasya darśanād ayaṃ pravibhāgena sādhanaṃ vyavasthāpya tasyeṣṭārthasaṃnidhānasaṃpratyayāt
T11bsa071_u:625: tathā yadasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na tu pararūpam /
T11bsa071_u:626: pratipattijanmani upayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve prameyapuruṣādīnāmapi tallakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet /
T11bsa071_u:627: na hi teṣvapi asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:630: sapakṣavipakṣayordarśanādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumiccatāṃ naiva samartho heturbhavati satorapi darśanādarśanayoragamakatvadarśanāt /
T11bsa071_u:631: tena bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamako heturiti jñāpanārtha niścitagrahaṇam /
T11bsa071_u:632: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
T11bsa071_u:639: tatsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākarṣatiḥ parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasyaḥ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ
T11bsa071_u:640: saṃvādakamiti tadrūpamapratipattṛṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttirna bhavatīti paropalakṣaṇātvādeva
T11bsa071_u:641: pravartake jñānaṃ siddhamḥ tathāpi tāveva viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvau kecid darśanādarśanamātreṇa
T11bsa071_u:644: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11bsa071_u:652: ekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyucyate naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyeti /
T11bsa071_u:653: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate,
T11bsa071_u:654: atadbhāve 'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:660: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet /
